programme.title: Cult of Chucky
programme.desc: Premiere. The killer doll from Child's Play returns to terrorise his human victim, Nica, and has scores to settle with his old enemies. Horror thriller, starring Fiona Dourif, Allison Dawn Doiron and Alex Vincent, with Brad Dourif as the voice of Chucky.

programme.title: Custody
programme.desc: Three women are brought together when a hard-working single mother has her children taken away. Courtroom drama, starring Viola Davis and Hayden Panettiere.

programme.title: Wheeler
programme.desc: Premiere. An aspiring musician from Kaufman, Texas travels to Nashville with the dream of trying his hand at country music. Drama, starring Stephen Dorff, Kris Kristofferson and Audrey Spillman.

programme.title: Black Panther: Special
programme.desc: A special preview of forthcoming superhero adventure Black Panther, which sees the titular king of the fictional state of Wakanda take centre stage in Marvel's cinematic universe.

programme.title: City of Tiny Lights
programme.desc: Premiere. A hard-drinking private detective searches for a missing sex worker, leading to a dangerous world of religious fanaticism and political intrigue. London-set crime thriller from Dredd director Pete Travis, starring Riz Ahmed, Billie Piper and James Floyd.

programme.title: Custody

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: Premiere. After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Premiere. An Amazon princess leaves home to fight in the First World War. Aside from falling for the dashing pilot she helped save, Diana Prince realises there is more to the enemy than meets the eye. Fantasy adventure, starring Gal Gadot, Chris Pine and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Numb
programme.desc: An impoverished couple discover GPS coordinates that promise to lead to stolen gold. They team up with a pair of mysterious hitchhikers to recover the coins from a wintry wilderness. Thriller, starring Jamie Bamber, Marie Avgeropoulos, Aleks Paunovic and Stefanie Von Pfetten.

programme.title: It Comes At Night
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a deadly plague, one desperate family agrees to shelter another, but can they be trusted? Horror thriller, starring Joel Edgerton, Christopher Abbott and Carmen Ejogo.(n)

programme.title: It Comes At Night
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a deadly plague, one desperate family agrees to shelter another, but can they be trusted? Horror thriller, starring Joel Edgerton, Christopher Abbott and Carmen Ejogo.(n)

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: A troubled Navy recruit is prone to violent outbursts and is ordered to see a psychiatrist, who gradually helps the mentally scarred sailor to come to terms with his past and abusive childhood. Fact-based drama, directed by and starring Denzel Washington. With Derek Luke, Joy Bryant and Salli Richardson.

programme.title: Shadowlands
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the later life of novelist CS Lewis, detailing how he fell in love with American poet Joy Gresham, only to see his new-found happiness marred by tragedy and illness. Directed by Richard Attenborough and starring Anthony Hopkins, Debra Winger, Edward Hardwicke, John Wood, Michael Denison and Joseph Mazzello.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: A former professional basketball player agrees to coach a high-school team, but he is unimpressed by its lack of discipline and instigates a tough new regimen. All goes well until the youngsters start to become complacent, forcing him to take drastic action - which leads to a backlash of complaints from angry parents and pupils alike. Drama, with Samuel L Jackson, Ashanti, Rob Brown and Robert Ri'chard.

programme.title: Racing Hearts
programme.desc: A businessman travels to a small Belgian village on an unusual assignment. A wealthy Dubai sheikh he is trying to make a deal with has a passion for pigeon racing, and wants to own a famous champion bird. As the visitor tries to persuade the breeder to part with the creature, he falls for the man's granddaughter. Romantic drama, with Jamie Dornan, Charlotte De Bruyne and Anthony Head.

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.

programme.title: Runaway Bride
programme.desc: A disreputable journalist hopes to get his ailing career back on track by writing an article about a commitment-shy woman famed for ditching bridegrooms at the altar - but complications arise when the pair meet on the eve of her latest attempt at marriage. Romantic comedy, starring Julia Roberts and Richard Gere, with Joan Cusack, Hector Elizondo and Rita Wilson.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: A Street Cat Named Bob
programme.desc: Homeless busker James Bowen has a life-changing moment when a tabby cat walks into his life. Comedy-drama based on the best selling novel, starring Luke Treadaway, Ruta Gedmintas and Anthony Head.

programme.title: The Truth About Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: A sharp-witted radio vet falls for a handsome caller, but shies away from meeting him because of her low self-esteem. Her glamorous but ditzy neighbour agrees to pose as her, setting the stage for a complex romantic triangle. Romantic comedy, starring Janeane Garofalo, Uma Thurman, Ben Chaplin and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: A tone deaf socialite has dreams of becoming a singer, but problems arise when she decides to perform at Carnegie Hall. Fact-based comedy, starring Meryl Streep.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory-loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd.

programme.title: Lowriders
programme.desc: A young LA street artist's life is complicated by his car-loving dad and ex-con brother. Drama, starring Gabriel Chavarria, Demian Bichir and Theo Rossi.

programme.title: Black Panther: Special
programme.desc: A special preview of forthcoming superhero adventure Black Panther, which sees the titular king of the fictional state of Wakanda take centre stage in Marvel's cinematic universe.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: After witnessing a mob hit in Chicago, two male jazz musicians don drag and hide out with an all-girl band to evade the gangsters pursuing them. However, the pair struggle to disguise their attraction for the beautiful lead singer - while one of them catches the eye of a smitten millionaire. Billy Wilder's classic romantic comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Tony Curtis and Marilyn Monroe.

programme.title: Just Jim
programme.desc: A Welsh teenager leads a lonely life after being rejected by his only friend. He becomes fascinated by a mysterious American who moves in next door, and the new arrival offers him some advice on how to be cool. The youngster starts to develop the life he had always longed for, but begins to wonder if he was happier the way he used to be. Comedy drama, starring Emile Hirsch and Craig Roberts.

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: Two students at Harvard University fall in love, but their romance is fated to be cut tragically short by the discovery that one of them has a terminal illness. Romantic drama, starring Ali MacGraw, Ryan O'Neal and Ray Milland.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican woman is offered a well-paid job as housekeeper to a wealthy American celebrity chef, and relocates with her daughter to Los Angeles - but her employer's neurotic wife causes all sorts of problems. Comedy directed by James L Brooks, starring Paz Vega, Adam Sandler, Tea Leoni and Cloris Leachman.

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: A successful New York fashion designer excitedly planning her wedding has to return to her home town in Alabama to persuade her first husband to sign the papers to finalise their divorce. However, seeing her childhood sweetheart stirs up old feelings, leaving the bride-to-be in a quandary over her future. Romantic comedy, starring Reese Witherspoon, Patrick Dempsey, Josh Lucas and Candice Bergen.

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young New Yorker's plan to have a kid on her own is derailed when she falls for a married man. Romantic comedy, starring Greta Gerwig, Ethan Hawke and Bill Hader.

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Fact-based romantic drama based on the life of writer Karen Blixen, who, after relocating from Denmark to a farm in Nairobi for a marriage of convenience, embarked on a passionate and ill-fated love affair with an idealistic British adventurer. Starring Meryl Streep, Robert Redford, Michael Kitchen, Klaus Maria Brandauer and Leslie Phillips.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican woman is offered a well-paid job as housekeeper to a wealthy American celebrity chef, and relocates with her daughter to Los Angeles - but her employer's neurotic wife causes all sorts of problems. Comedy directed by James L Brooks, starring Paz Vega, Adam Sandler, Tea Leoni and Cloris Leachman.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: A youth probation officer at a maximum-security detention centre is determined to teach the adolescents in his care that they have a chance to turn their lives around. In a bid to boost morale, he helps the inmates form an American football team. Fact-based sports drama, starring Dwayne Johnson, L Scott Caldwell, Leon Rippy and Xzibit.(n)

programme.title: Frankie & Alice
programme.desc: A black dancer develops multiple personality disorder, with one of her alter egos an angry white racist from the Deep South. With the help of a psychiatrist, she delves into her past in the hope of identifying the childhood trauma that has caused her condition. Fact-based drama, starring Halle Berry and Stellan Skarsgard.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Knows, Mr Allison
programme.desc: A US marine corporal stationed on a South Pacific island and a novice nun on a mission are forced into the hills when Japanese forces arrive and set up military bases during the Second World War. Before long the pair develop strong emotional ties, but in resisting their feelings for each other the relationship becomes one of deep mutual respect. Romantic drama, written and directed by John Huston, with Robert Mitchum and Deborah Kerr.(n)

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: A charismatic English teacher at a New England prep school in the 1950s raises eyebrows among his strait-laced colleagues by encouraging the students to live life beyond their expectations. Unfortunately, the boys find their families and the rest of the teaching staff are not so understanding about their desire to follow their dreams. Peter Weir's drama, starring Robin Williams, Robert Sean Leonard, Ethan Hawke, Josh Charles and Gale Hansen.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Biopic of soul singer Ray Charles, exploring his battle against racial bigotry, drug addiction and personal demons on his rise to stardom. Blind by the time he was seven, the musician flirted with several styles including gospel, jazz and country, and became known as one of the music industry's most innovative performers. Starring an Oscar-winning Jamie Foxx alongside Regina King and Kerry Washington.(n)

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A single man realises he is in love with his best friend, but has never done anything about it out of a fear of commitment. Everything changes when she returns from a business trip to Scotland with a new fiance in tow, leaving him determined to make sure the wedding does not go ahead. Romantic comedy, starring Patrick Dempsey, Michelle Monaghan and Kevin McKidd.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Biopic of soul singer Ray Charles, exploring his battle against racial bigotry, drug addiction and personal demons on his rise to stardom. Blind by the time he was seven, the musician flirted with several styles including gospel, jazz and country, and became known as one of the music industry's most innovative performers. Starring an Oscar-winning Jamie Foxx alongside Regina King and Kerry Washington.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A lazy twentysomething lives off his wealthy hotel magnate father. When the old man decides to retire, he begins to question whether his layabout son is suitable to take over the family empire and issues a challenge - he must retake 12 years of school in 24 weeks, or lose everything. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Bridgette Wilson, Darren McGavin and Bradley Whitford.

programme.title: Jackass 2.5
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his foolhardy crew return for another instalment of the anarchic comedy series. The outrageous stunts performed by the group of friends include lying on a bed of nails accompanied by two snakes and riding motor bikes through a shopping mall. With Bam Margera, Steve-O and Chris Pontius.

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee.

programme.title: Killing Hasselhoff
programme.desc: A debt-ridden nightclub owner decides to rig his celebrity death pool, which means killing his pick - the star of Knight Rider and Baywatch. Comedy, starring Ken Jeong, Jim Jefferies and David Hasselhoff.

programme.title: Love Of My Life
programme.desc: A woman diagnosed with a fatal brain tumour accepts her fate without fuss, but then her first husband pitches up vowing to win her back. Romantic comedy, starring Anna Chancellor, John Hannah and Hermione Norris.

programme.title: Any Which Way You Can
programme.desc: Street-fighting trucker Philo Beddoe and his faithful orang-utan Clyde are targeted by the Mafia, who want to cash in on Philo's potential as a money-making brawler. However, they first have to kidnap him before they can persuade him to go along with their plans. Comedy sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Geoffrey Lewis, Harry Guardino and Ruth Gordon.

programme.title: Airplane II: The Sequel
programme.desc: Hapless hero Ted Striker tries to prevent the launch of a passenger space shuttle, certain it will end in disaster. Sadly, his prediction comes true when a computer malfunction sends the spacecraft hurtling toward the sun, while a man driven mad by sexual inadequacy smuggles a bomb on board. Disaster movie spoof sequel, starring Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Lloyd Bridges, William Shatner, Sonny Bono and Chad Everett.

programme.title: Table 19
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: A male nurse delays proposing to his girlfriend until he has won the approval of her strict father, a former CIA agent who does not suffer fools gladly, and vows to be on his best behaviour during a visit to her family home. However, his efforts to impress soon collapse into a catalogue of disasters. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Teri Polo, Blythe Danner and Owen Wilson.

programme.title: That Thing You Do
programme.desc: A small-town beat combo become a national overnight sensation with their debut record - but their sudden success looks to be a one-off, leaving them struggling to find a way of repeating the formula. Comedy drama set in the 1960s, written and directed by Tom Hanks, who also appears as the band's manager. With Tom Everett Scott, Liv Tyler and Johnathon Schaech.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: A Californian detective investigating the murder of a local man by drug smugglers has only one witness to help him solve the case - the large, smelly dog that belonged to the victim, which is about to turn the detective's well-ordered existence into chaos. Family comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Mare Winningham and Craig T Nelson.

programme.title: Table 19
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: A male nurse delays proposing to his girlfriend until he has won the approval of her strict father, a former CIA agent who does not suffer fools gladly, and vows to be on his best behaviour during a visit to her family home. However, his efforts to impress soon collapse into a catalogue of disasters. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Teri Polo, Blythe Danner and Owen Wilson.

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Four students hit the road, heading off on a foolhardy mission to retrieve an embarrassing video mistakenly sent to an unsuspecting girlfriend - but it is not long before things go wrong and they end up having several nasty scrapes. Comedy, starring Tom Green as the tale's narrator, with Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Paulo Costanzo and DJ Qualls.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A Nascar racing champion has everything he could want - until an arrogant French rival seizes the title from him, and his wife runs off with his best friend. Forced to move back in with his mother, the downhearted driver turns to his estranged father for help rebuilding his shattered self-confidence. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Third movie based on the MTV comedy series, in which Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Ryan Dunn and the rest of the fearless team of pranksters embark on even more strange and disturbing stunts, which range from gluing themselves together, enraging dangerous animals and firing an occupied portable toilet from a catapult.

programme.title: Black Panther: Special
programme.desc: A special preview of forthcoming superhero adventure Black Panther, which sees the titular king of the fictional state of Wakanda take centre stage in Marvel's cinematic universe.

programme.title: Did You Hear about the Morgans
programme.desc: A bickering, separated couple on the brink of divorce are thrown back together when they witness a murder. The FBI arrange for them to go into hiding in a remote mountain town, a predicament that could either save their marriage or see them at each other's throats more than ever. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant and Sarah Jessica Parker.

programme.title: Who's Harry Crumb
programme.desc: A bungling private eye sets out to rescue the abducted daughter of a millionaire. Unfortunately, the hapless sleuth is unaware his oily boss is behind the kidnapping and has only given him the task because he is sure to fail - while leaving himself free to make a move on the millionaire's wife. Comedy, starring John Candy, Jeffrey Jones, Annie Potts and Tim Thomerson.

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: A baseball player is stunned to learn he has come into a massive inheritance. Unfortunately, there is one condition - he must somehow find a way to spend $30million in just one month, or he will lose the lot. Meanwhile, two scheming lawyers, who stand to get the money if he fails, are determined to sabotage his efforts. Comedy, starring Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee and Jerry Orbach.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: A couple on the brink of divorce sign up for relationship therapy on a tropical island, but find they can save money if they persuade their friends to join them. Three more couples go along for the holiday, thinking they do not need any help - but the unconventional treatment soon exposes cracks in their relationships. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Malin Akerman, Jon Favreau and Jason Bateman.

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor.

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: A feminist FBI agent is sent undercover as a contestant in the Miss United States pageant when the event becomes the target of a terrorist bomb threat. As she is not exactly catwalk material, a veteran British coach is brought on board to oversee her transformation into a glamorous beauty queen. Comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen and William Shatner.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie Hart is taken off active duty and made the face of the bureau's publicity campaign, but would rather catch crooks than be the focus of media attention - so when her friends are kidnapped, she disobeys orders to run her own undercover investigation with the help of a short-tempered colleague. Comedy sequel, starring Sandra Bullock, Regina King, William Shatner and Heather Burns.

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor.

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: A mild-mannered English teacher is challenged to an after-school scuffle by a fellow faculty member. Comedy, starring Charlie Day, Ice Cube and Tracy Morgan.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two teenage friends are on the brink of going to different colleges, so decide to mark the event by going to a party where they hope to lose their virginity. However, they have promised to supply the booze for the event, a task that proves much harder than expected because they are under age. Unfortunately, when a friend steps in to help, the situation gets even worse. Comedy, starring Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse.

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: A reckless sports writer and his lawyer hit the highways in search of the American Dream, heading for the Nevada gambling capital in a convertible stocked with alcohol and drugs. Comedy, adapted by Terry Gilliam from Hunter S Thompson's book, starring Johnny Depp, Benicio Del Toro, Ellen Barkin, Christina Ricci and Tobey Maguire.(n)

programme.title: Jackass 3.5
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his death-defying team of pranksters embark on even more strange and disturbing stunts in this compilation of material filmed for the third movie in the comedy series. Gags featured include misuse of a defibrillator machine and provoking an alligator.(n)

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: A lowly insurance clerk tries to curry favour with his seedy manager by lending him his flat for his extramarital flings. But the clerk soon grows wise to the nastiness of corporate ethics and infidelity when his heartless boss seduces the elevator girl, whom he has always loved from afar. Oscar-winning comedy drama, directed by Billy Wilder and starring Jack Lemmon, Fred MacMurray and Shirley MacLaine.(n)

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory-loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd.(n)

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A by-the-book Los Angeles cop is paired with a laidback new partner to investigate the nefarious activities of a TV evangelist and a pornographic-magazine baron suspected of operating a criminal cult. Comedy spoof of the 1950s TV series, starring Dan Aykroyd, Tom Hanks, Christopher Plummer and the original show's star Harry Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: A timid man's life is ruined after he is bullied into marrying an overbearing, overweight woman. However, a more hopeful future beckons when he bumps into his childhood sweetheart and realises she is his one true love - but first he has to pluck up the courage to confront his tyrannical wife. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles alongside Thandie Newton, Cuba Gooding Jr and Terry Crews.(n)

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller.(n)

programme.title: 30 Minutes or Less
programme.desc: A small-time crook hopes to fund a business venture by having his father killed and claiming an inheritance, but finds hiring a hitman is too expensive. He and his sidekick resort to kidnapping a pizza delivery boy, attaching a bomb to him and sending him off to rob a bank on their behalf. However, the scheme does not go to plan. Comedy adventure, with Jesse Eisenberg and Danny McBride.(n)

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Three downtrodden female office employees grow fed up with their chauvinistic boss, and spend hours daydreaming about getting their own back. Unexpectedly their fantasies become reality when a series of comic mishaps results in their kidnapping him - and teaching him a long-overdue lesson. Comedy, starring Dolly Parton, Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin and Dabney Coleman.(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: When her husband dies of leukaemia, a Women's Institute member is inspired to raise funds for the local hospital. Casting inhibitions and clothes aside, the widow and her daring friend encourage their fellow members to pose nude for a charity calendar, causing a stir in their Yorkshire village and beyond. Nigel Cole's fact-based comedy drama, starring Helen Mirren, Julie Walters, Annette Crosbie, Celia Imrie and Penelope Wilton.(n)

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller.(n)

programme.title: 30 Minutes or Less
programme.desc: A small-time crook hopes to fund a business venture by having his father killed and claiming an inheritance, but finds hiring a hitman is too expensive. He and his sidekick resort to kidnapping a pizza delivery boy, attaching a bomb to him and sending him off to rob a bank on their behalf. However, the scheme does not go to plan. Comedy adventure, with Jesse Eisenberg and Danny McBride.(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: A lowly fish-tank cleaner working at a gigolo's luxurious house has his eyes opened to a completely new way of life - but an accident with his employer's prized pets puts him into a tricky situation. Desperate to raise a quick buck, he is soon entertaining a series of increasingly sex-crazed women. Comedy, starring Rob Schneider, William Forsythe, Eddie Griffin, Oded Fehr and Gail O'Grady.(n)

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: A military officer is sent to Iraq after the downfall of Saddam Hussein on a mission to find the weapons of mass destruction that were used to justify the invasion - only to be warned by a CIA agent that no such devices exist. As he continues his fruitless search, he discovers evidence of a political conspiracy. Paul Greengrass's thriller, starring Matt Damon, Greg Kinnear and Brendan Gleeson.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safe-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox.

programme.title: Titan AE
programme.desc: In the year 3038, an alien race has annihilated almost all of mankind and destroyed the Earth. A scientist escapes the planet on board a craft that is destined to be humanity's only chance of future survival - the spaceship Titan. Fourteen years later, his estranged son plucks up courage and sets out on a perilous journey to find the ship and reunite with his father. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Matt Damon, Bill Pullman and Drew Barrymore.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Philadelphia brawler Rocky Balboa gets a shot at the world heavyweight title when current champion Apollo Creed decides to give an unknown boxer a chance in celebration of America's bicentennial. Oscar-winning drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young and Carl Weathers.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: The ageing fighter contemplates a return to the ring when a computer simulation reveals he would have defeated the current world heavyweight champion Mason `The Line' Dixon, who responds by challenging Rocky to face him for real. Boxing drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Antonio Tarver, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young, Milo Ventimiglia and Tony Burton.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Philadelphia brawler Rocky Balboa gets a shot at the world heavyweight title when current champion Apollo Creed decides to give an unknown boxer a chance in celebration of America's bicentennial. Oscar-winning drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young and Carl Weathers.

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Philadelphia boxer Rocky Balboa quits the ring to marry his sweetheart and become a father. However, times prove hard and money is tight, so when Balboa is offered another shot at Apollo Creed's heavyweight title, the fighter is lured out of retirement. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers, Burt Young and Burgess Meredith.

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: World heavyweight boxing champion Rocky Balboa settles down into a life of luxury - but a cloud appears on the horizon in the shape of ambitious contender Clubber Lang, whose brutal fighting style represents a serious threat to his title. Drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Mr T, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers and Hulk Hogan.

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: The Italian Stallion agrees to help former champion Apollo Creed train for a match against a seemingly invincible boxer from the Soviet Union, only to see his friend die as a result of injuries sustained in the fight. Rocky vows to avenge him, and prepares to take on the Russian heavyweight in his own country. Drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Dolph Lundgren, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers and Brigitte Nielsen.

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: The heavyweight champion is forced into retirement due to brain damage inflicted in the ring, and finds his fortune has been lost on the stock market by his accountant. Returning to his working-class roots, he trains an up-and-coming fighter, only to see his protege turn against him. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire and real-life boxer Tommy Morrison.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: The ageing fighter contemplates a return to the ring when a computer simulation reveals he would have defeated the current world heavyweight champion Mason `The Line' Dixon, who responds by challenging Rocky to face him for real. Boxing drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Antonio Tarver, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young, Milo Ventimiglia and Tony Burton.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The bandana-wearing one-man army has turned his back on violence to live a quiet life in Thailand. But before long he takes up arms once again to rescue a party of missionaries who have been taken captive en route to Burma by a sadistic military officer. Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Julie Benz and Graham McTavish.

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: A talented martial arts expert gets entangled with a tenacious undercover reporter as he takes part in an illegal fighting tournament, where the last man standing wins the day - and the losers usually end up in the cemetery. Action adventure, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Donald Gibb, Leah Ayres, Norman Burton and Roy Chiao.

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: A maverick Canadian Mountie poses as a convict to smash a sinister plot involving the sale of human organs, only to find himself facing a desperate fight for survival. Thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Robert Guillaume and Cynthia Gibb.

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic warrior risks his life to protect a female android who holds the key to curing a man-made plague devastating humanity. However, a host of bloodthirsty warriors are determined to stop them getting to the scientists who need the information. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dayle Haddon, Deborah Richter and Vincent Klyn.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Philadelphia brawler Rocky Balboa gets a shot at the world heavyweight title when current champion Apollo Creed decides to give an unknown boxer a chance in celebration of America's bicentennial. Oscar-winning drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young and Carl Weathers.

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary computer salesman leads a double life as a secret agent battling international terrorism. His naive wife is unaware of his dual employment, and goes in search of adventure - only to end up in the clutches of terrorists who have stolen a nuclear weapon. James Cameron's action comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis and Tom Arnold.

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: John Connor finds his destiny to lead the human race in a future war is catching up with him when an advanced new Terminator in female form is sent back in time to eliminate him. However, a reprogrammed cyborg has also been dispatched to act as his protector. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken.

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: A heroic firefighter is plunged into the world of international terrorism when his wife and child are killed in a horrific attack. Disillusioned with the progress of the official investigation, he decides to take on the villains himself and heads for Colombia on a dangerous mission of revenge, determined to bring the perpetrators to justice. Action thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Francesca Neri, Elias Koteas and Cliff Curtis.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A cyborg assassin is sent on a murderous mission back in time to the 20th century, where he wreaks havoc while searching for his intended victim - a woman whose unborn son is destined to lead the human race in a war against machines. However, a soldier has also been sent from the future to protect her. James Cameron's sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton and Michael Biehn.

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary computer salesman leads a double life as a secret agent battling international terrorism. His naive wife is unaware of his dual employment, and goes in search of adventure - only to end up in the clutches of terrorists who have stolen a nuclear weapon. James Cameron's action comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis and Tom Arnold.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin O'Brien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A child who grows up in slavery becomes a formidable warrior and a cunning thief. Taken prisoner by a victorious king, he is sent out to destroy the leader of the barbaric cult that destroyed his village and slaughtered his family. Fantasy adventure, based on the stories by author Robert E Howard, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Max von Sydow, James Earl Jones and Sandahl Bergman.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A cyborg assassin is sent on a murderous mission back in time to the 20th century, where he wreaks havoc while searching for his intended victim - a woman whose unborn son is destined to lead the human race in a war against machines. However, a soldier has also been sent from the future to protect her. James Cameron's sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton and Michael Biehn.

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: A heroic firefighter is plunged into the world of international terrorism when his wife and child are killed in a horrific attack. Disillusioned with the progress of the official investigation, he decides to take on the villains himself and heads for Colombia on a dangerous mission of revenge, determined to bring the perpetrators to justice. Action thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Francesca Neri, Elias Koteas and Cliff Curtis.(n)

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin O'Brien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn.(n)

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: The caped crusader and his sidekick take on the villainous Mr Freeze, who plans to destroy Gotham City with an icy doomsday weapon unless his demands are met. The dynamic duo also have to contend with femme fatale Poison Ivy, who is determined to drive a wedge between them. Comic-book adventure, starring George Clooney, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Uma Thurman and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook assembles a motley gang to steal £4million in gold bullion from an Italian armoured car, which brings Turin to a standstill and enables the robbers to make a quick getaway in a fleet of Minis - but they end up falling foul of the Mafia along the way. Crime comedy, starring Michael Caine, Noel Coward, Benny Hill, Tony Beckley and John Le Mesurier.(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Four soldiers are sent on a top-secret mission in Iraq that results in them being imprisoned for a crime they did not commit. When they learn the culprit is trying to sell equipment for producing fake currency, they break out of prison to find both him and evidence of their innocence. Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism, the crew faces the biggest trials of their lives. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious island, a top-secret mission to the same region descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson.(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Four soldiers are sent on a top-secret mission in Iraq that results in them being imprisoned for a crime they did not commit. When they learn the culprit is trying to sell equipment for producing fake currency, they break out of prison to find both him and evidence of their innocence. Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism, the crew faces the biggest trials of their lives. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious island, a top-secret mission to the same region descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: A friendship develops between a down-at-heel streetwise New York eccentric and a naive Texas country boy who aspires to be a well-paid gigolo. Oscar-winning drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Jon Voight, Brenda Vaccaro and Sylvia Miles.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: American officer Aldo Raine leads a squad of soldiers into occupied France on a mission to kill as many Nazis as possible and spread fear through the Third Reich. They become involved in a Jewish resistance fighter's plan to blow up the premiere of a propaganda movie - due to be attended by Hitler himself. Quentin Tarantino's wartime adventure, with Brad Pitt, Melanie Laurent, Diane Kruger, Michael Fassbender and an Oscar-winning Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: The Measure of a Man
programme.desc: An unemployed man struggles to support his wife and son on meagre state benefits, while contending with pointless and humiliating bureaucracy as she searches for a job. He is eventually employed as a firm's head of security, only to discover his new position confronts him with a terrible moral dilemma. Drama, starring Vincent Lindon and Karine de Mirbeck. In French.

programme.title: The Wonders
programme.desc: The lives of a family of bee keepers living in isolation in central Italy are disturbed by the arrival of a troubled teenage boy, who has been taken on as a farmhand, and a television production crew. Against her father's wishes, Gelsomina enters the family onto a reality TV show about traditional Italian food. Drama, starring Alba Rohrwacher. In Italian.

programme.title: Gueros
programme.desc: A mischievous boy causes so much trouble for his mother that she sends him to live with his older brother. The youngster persuades his sibling and his roommate to help him travel across Mexico on a mission to visit his favourite musician in hospital - a quest that reunites the elder sibling with an old flame. Comedy drama, starring Sebastian Aguirre and Tenoch Huerta. In Spanish.

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall.

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Hapless Sonny and his sidekick Sal have a plan to rob a Brooklyn bank. The novice crooks thought they would be in and out in 10 minutes, but instead find themselves stuck in an ongoing hostage situation, with the police and the media laying siege to the bank. Sidney Lumet's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, John Cazale and Charles Durning.

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: African slaves seize control of the vessel transporting them to Spain in 1839. Two surviving Spanish crewmen steer the ship to America, where the slaves are imprisoned for killing their captors - but an abolitionist lawyer argues the case for granting them their freedom. Steven Spielberg's historical drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Morgan Freeman, Matthew McConaughey, Djimon Hounsou, Nigel Hawthorne and Pete Postlethwaite.

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: A habitual thief and his cop wife are distraught to discover they cannot have children, so set out to kidnap one of five babies born to a local tycoon. However, a relentless bounty hunter is soon on their trail, while two escaped convicts hope to get a reward for returning the child. Coen brothers comedy, starring Nicolas Cage, Holly Hunter, John Goodman and Frances McDormand.

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: CIA agent Roger Ferris hatches a bold but dangerous plan to capture terrorist Al-Saleem. With the help of Ed Hoffman who is a master of subterfuge, Ferris creates a fake terrorist organization to prompt Al-Saleem out of hiding. Spy thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Russell Crowe.

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance.

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Hapless Sonny and his sidekick Sal have a plan to rob a Brooklyn bank. The novice crooks thought they would be in and out in 10 minutes, but instead find themselves stuck in an ongoing hostage situation, with the police and the media laying siege to the bank. Sidney Lumet's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, John Cazale and Charles Durning.

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: Biopic of boxer Jake LaMotta, who rose to fame as the world middleweight champion in the 1940s. His career was marred by an inability to deal with his anger, leaving his family bearing the brunt of his rage and paranoia. Directed by Martin Scorsese and starring an Oscar-winning Robert De Niro alongside Joe Pesci and Cathy Moriarty.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: A war veteran criss-crosses America with his disabled brother in tow as he builds a new career as a renowned prizefighter. However, his ruthless determination to make it to the top drives him to betray the people closest to him. Drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Marilyn Maxwell, Arthur Kennedy, Paul Stewart and Ruth Roman.

programme.title: Winter
programme.desc: A father consumed by grief must come to terms with an emotional breakdown in order to save his relationship with his two young sons. Drama, starring Tommy Flanagan, Edward Ashley and David Broughton-Davies.

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: A 14-year-old boy living in 1970s London has his life changed forever when his is introduced to The Clash by his estranged mother. Drama, starring Tom Hughes, Jonathan Rhys Meyers and Dougray Scott.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: Mortals and creatures set out to capture a young creature born to a human father and a monster queen. Fantasy adventure, starring Baihe Bai, Boran Jing and Wu Jiang. In Mandarin.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: A misfit teen from a tough California neighbourhood embarks on a perilous journey to retrieve a pair of stolen sneakers. Coming-of-age drama, starring Jahking Guillory, Christopher Jordan Wallace and Mahershala Ali.

programme.title: Villa Rides
programme.desc: An American pilot acts as a gunrunner for Mexican rebels during the 1912 uprising, but when he meets the famous revolutionary Pancho Villa, he is coerced into joining the fighting. He makes an enemy of Villa's right-hand man, while the rebel leader faces treachery from his political allies. Action adventure, starring Yul Brynner, Robert Mitchum, Charles Bronson and Herbert Lom.

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: During the Second World War, German businessman Oskar Schindler strives to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: A white rapper strives to make a name for himself on the music scene, but his deprived home life on a Detroit trailer park and romantic complications put a damper on his plans as he struggles to win over the crowds and earn the respect of his peers. Drama, starring Eminem, Kim Basinger, Mekhi Phifer and Brittany Murphy.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Mann's thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A successful doctor is shocked to discover his wife once harboured feelings for another man and resolves to get even by embarking on an affair of his own - only to end up involved with a dangerous exclusive cult. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Sydney Pollack and Marie Richardson.(n)

programme.title: The People vs Larry Flynt
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the notorious American strip-club owner whose move into pornographic publishing fuelled a major obscenity trial - during which he suffered a gunshot wound which paralysed him from the waist down - and made him an unlikely champion of free expression. Starring Woody Harrelson, Courtney Love, Edward Norton and Brett Harrelson.(n)

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.(n)

programme.title: Lemon
programme.desc: A calamity-stricken actor's career and personal life starts crumbling around him. Comedy drama, starring Brett Gelman, Judy Greer and Michael Cera.(n)

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.(n)

programme.title: The Smuggler
programme.desc: The police intercept a suspected drugs mule they believe has swallowed condoms filled with heroin on his re-entry to his native Australia. He can only be charged after the illicit substance is ejected by his body - so he spends the next week incarcerated with the authorities keeping an eye on his every movement. Comedy drama, starring Hugo Weaving, Angus Sampson and Leigh Whannell.(n)

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins.(n)

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith.(n)

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: An American counter-terrorism unit travels around the world on the lookout for threats to global peace, causing much destruction to major world cities in the process. The biggest current menace is North Korean leader Kim Jong-il and an organisation much closer to home - the Film Actors Guild. Satirical puppet comedy, voiced by South Park creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone.(n)

programme.title: Crazy Heart
programme.desc: Washed-up country music star Bad Blake is heading for an early grave thanks to his alcoholic, chain-smoking lifestyle on the road. However, when he rides up to play a gig in Santa Fe, he encounters a journalist and single mother whose affection grants him a new lease of life. Drama, starring an Oscar-winning Jeff Bridges, alongside Maggie Gyllenhaal, Colin Farrell and Jack Nation.(n)

programme.title: Blade Runner: Theatrical Version
programme.desc: A former cop in a bleak future Los Angeles is forced to return to duty for a mission to hunt down and kill a group of renegade android replicants. The fugitives have escaped from a space colony to find their creator on Earth, in a bid to prolong their limited lifespan. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller, in the cut originally released in cinemas, Starring Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young and Daryl Hannah.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 1
programme.desc: A female assassin wakes from a four-year coma and promptly sets out on a campaign to wipe out her erstwhile colleagues, who tried to kill her at her own wedding - one of whom is now the kingpin of the Tokyo underworld. The first part of Quentin Tarantino's two-part martial arts thriller, starring Uma Thurman, Lucy Liu, Vivica A Fox, Daryl Hannah and David Carradine.(n)

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer.

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Along with a veteran mariner and a diver, he is picked up and taken captive by Captain Nemo and whisked away on a series of adventures in his futuristic submarine. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre.

programme.title: Leroy and Stitch
programme.desc: Animated sequel, which sees the lovable alien and his friends split up as they pursue their own lives across the galaxy. However, they are soon forced to unite when an old enemy escapes from prison and creates an evil duplicate of Stitch - which he then clones, to raise an army and take over the universe. With the voices of Daveigh Chase and Tia Carrere.

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer.

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure
programme.desc: The little pup struggles to establish his own identity among his numerous brothers and sisters. He embarks on an exciting escapade across the capital with his favourite TV star, but the sinister Cruella DeVil returns to cause more havoc. Animated sequel, with the voices of Bobby Lockwood, Barry Bostwick, Jason Alexander, Martin Short and Sam West.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans.

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt.

programme.title: The Aristocats
programme.desc: A jealous butler is outraged when his employer leaves a vast fortune to her cat and kittens instead of to him, so he drives the pets to the French countryside and dumps them. However, a streetwise alley cat steps in to help the pampered felines find their way home and claim their rightful inheritance. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Eva Gabor, Phil Harris and Scatman Crothers.

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer.

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: Reporters Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear are sacked for missing out on a massive scoop about the theft of jewellery from famous British fashion designer Lady Holiday. To try to re-establish their reputations, the duo and Gonzo fly to London to see if they can track down the culprit. Comedy, with the voices of Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with cameo appearances by John Cleese, Diana Rigg, Charles Grodin and Peter Ustinov.

programme.title: Fantasia 2000
programme.desc: Animated family comedy. A continuation of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush.

programme.title: The Aristocats
programme.desc: A jealous butler is outraged when his employer leaves a vast fortune to her cat and kittens instead of to him, so he drives the pets to the French countryside and dumps them. However, a streetwise alley cat steps in to help the pampered felines find their way home and claim their rightful inheritance. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Eva Gabor, Phil Harris and Scatman Crothers.

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

programme.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
programme.desc: Disney animated version of the Brothers Grimm story about a princess driven from her home into a sinister forest by her evil stepmother. She is taken in by a group of kindly dwarf miners, but her happiness is threatened when her stepmother returns bearing a poisoned apple. The first ever feature length animated movie, with the voices of Adriana Caselotti and Lucille La Verne.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: The son of Zeus, king of the Greek gods, is sent to Earth to be raised as a human. When he learns of his immortal heritage, he discovers he can only reclaim his position among the gods by becoming a true hero, so he embarks on a series of adventures and battles fearsome monsters to prove his worth. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Tate Donovan, Danny DeVito, James Woods and Rip Torn.

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. Retrieving the object from a wondrous cave, he releases a powerful genie trapped inside, whose ability to grant wishes helps the young hero thwart the villain's plans and woo a princess. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.

programme.title: Muppet Treasure Island
programme.desc: A youngster finds a treasure map and joins an expedition searching for a famous buccaneer's lost treasure on an unexplored island. However, their mission falls foul of a band of pirates hiding out among the crew. Musical comedy based on Robert Louis Stevenson's novel, starring Tim Curry, Billy Connolly, Jennifer Saunders and Kevin Bishop alongside the puppet characters.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: The son of Zeus, king of the Greek gods, is sent to Earth to be raised as a human. When he learns of his immortal heritage, he discovers he can only reclaim his position among the gods by becoming a true hero, so he embarks on a series of adventures and battles fearsome monsters to prove his worth. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Tate Donovan, Danny DeVito, James Woods and Rip Torn.

programme.title: Disney's Blank Cheque
programme.desc: Convicted bank-robber Carl Quigley plots to exchange $1,000,000 in stolen bills by coercing a bank's president into swapping the notes for legal tender. As he tries to escape the scene of his plot, Quigley runs over 11-year-old Preston Waters' bicycle, and in his haste to get away, offers the boy a blank cheque as compensation. However, Quigley fails to anticipate tech-savvy Preston exploiting the gesture to help himself to the criminal's million-dollar fortune, then embarking a dream spending spree. Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: The adventures of the legendary outlaw and Sherwood Forest's band of heroes as they rob the rich to feed the poor, while evil Prince John hatches a cunning plan to exact revenge and finish off the brigands. Disney animation, with the voices of Terry-Thomas, Peter Ustinov, Phil Harris, Brian Bedford and Monica Evans.(n)

programme.title: Disney's Kim Possible Movie: So the Drama
programme.desc: Feature length adventure of the animated series. The daring teenage heroine has to foil the evil Dr Drakken's fiendish plan to take over the world - but she also has to find a date for the prom. While she is delighted when the new boy at school asks her, her acceptance upsets her friend Ron, and prompts the pair to re-evaluate their feelings for each other. With the voice of Christy Carlson Romano and Will Friedle.(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: A group of lemurs finds a dinosaur egg, and when it hatches, brings the baby lizard up. When a meteor strike destroys their territory, the reptile and his mammal family must go in search of a new home, a quest that leads to dangerous encounters with other creatures. Animated adventure, with the voices of DB Sweeney, Julianna Margulies and Joan Plowright.(n)

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.(n)

programme.title: Zootropolis
programme.desc: In a city populated by animals, a rabbit achieves her dream of becoming the first bunny to become a police officer - but faces prejudice at every turn. When the disappearance of an otter hints at a terrible conspiracy in the city, she enlists the aid of a con-artist fox in solving the mystery. Disney animated comedy, with the voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: With the help of a magical dragon, a lonely orphan boy escapes from a life of servitude with the cruel Gogan family. He makes a fresh start in a seaside town, befriending a lighthouse keeper and her father, but the Gogans are soon on his trail, while a phoney doctor wants the dragon for his travelling show. Part-animated musical fantasy, starring Jim Dale, Sean Marshall, Helen Reddy, Mickey Rooney and Shelley Winters.(n)

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth to abduct the Looney Tunes gang as a new attraction at their failing intergalactic theme park. To keep their freedom, Bugs Bunny and friends challenge the invaders to a high-stakes basketball game, calling on Michael Jordan to save the day and send the extraterrestrials back where they came from. Live action and animated comedy, starring Bill Murray and Danny DeVito, with the voices of Billy West and Bill Farmer.

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: The tyrannical Ivan Ooze is accidentally released from his super-secure prison by dim-witted construction workers after 6,000 years in captivity. Vowing to conquer the Earth, he unleashes a reign of terror on Los Angeles - leaving the colour-coded champions fighting to save the world from his evil clutches. Sci-fi adventure, starring Paul Freeman, David Yost, Jason David Frank, Steve Cardenas, Karan Ashley and Johnny Yong Bosch.

programme.title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
programme.desc: Arch-villainess Divatox plots to take over the Earth by corrupting the powers of a kindly old wizard, and only the colour-coded crusaders, joined by old team-mates Jason and Kimberley, stand in her way. Sci-fi adventure, with Jason David Frank and Johnny Yong Bosch.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell.

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Super Furry Animals
programme.desc: Chaos erupts when a cowardly critter uses an untested scientific contraption and accidentally swaps bodies with a caterpillar. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Vinnie Penna, Peter Linz, Mike Pollock and Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson.

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: A penguin longs to follow in the footsteps of his hero, legendary surfer Big Z, and leaves his Antarctic home to compete in a prestigious tournament on a tropical island. Unfortunately the waves in this warmer climate are much bigger than anything he has experienced - and the egotistical reigning champion does not take kindly to competition. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jeff Bridges and Shia LaBeouf.

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson.

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
