The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith.

programme.title: Toys
programme.desc: A dying toy-maker leaves the company to his brother, a power-mad general, who turns the friendly family factory over to the production of weapons. It falls to the general's zany nephew and his equally childlike sister to stand up for their father's benign world-view. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack and Donald O'Connor.

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: A mad scientist kidnaps a beagle to use as a guinea pig in his deranged experiments. But an accidental injection leaves the mutt with awe-inspiring superpowers, which he uses to foil the deranged inventor's plans to take over a city. Comedy adventure, starring Peter Dinklage and James Belushi, and featuring the voices of Jason Lee and Amy Adams.

programme.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
programme.desc: A fairy living in a forest encounters a member of a lumber crew and magically shrinks him down to her size. He learns about the damage humans are doing to the area, and helps defend it when his fellow loggers unwittingly unleash an evil spirit that had been entombed in a tree. Animated adventure, with the voices of Robin Williams, Christian Slater and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Christmas in the Smokies
programme.desc: A young woman battling to save her family's Smoky Mountain berry farm decides to organise a Christmas concert, calling in a favour from her country music star ex-boyfriend. Romantic drama, starring Sarah Lancaster, Barry Corbin and Alan Powell.

programme.title: The Secret of Moonacre
programme.desc: When her father dies, 13-year-old Maria is sent to live with her eccentric uncle in Moonacre Manor. The youngster finds herself drawn into a magical conflict when she learns she is destined to become the last Moon Princess and is charged with unearthing secrets of the past to prevent the mystical kingdom disappearing forever. Fantasy adventure set in the 19th century, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Ioan Gruffudd and Tim Curry.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A gifted youngster is packed off by her selfish parents to the prison-like Crunchem Hall School. Once there, she befriends a sweet-natured teacher who convinces her that not all grown-ups are bad - and urges her to use her special powers to turn the tables on the nasty headmistress. Fantasy comedy, adapted from the children's book by Roald Dahl, with Mara Wilson, Pam Ferris, Embeth Davidtz, Rhea Perlman and Danny DeVito, who also directed.

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp.

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Pele: Birth Of A Legend
programme.desc: Biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. Starring Kevin de Paula, Vincent D'Onofrio and Rodrigo Santoro.

Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.(n)

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians Of The Golden Egg
programme.desc: When the Easter rabbit school comes under threat from a family of foxes plotting to steal the legendary golden egg, it's up to young Max to save the day. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Noah Levi and Senta Berger.(n)

programme.title: Candy Planet
programme.desc: When her mother is accidentally turned into a sweet, Rainie and her friends must journey to Candy Planet and uncover an incredible secret. Animated adventure.(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown.(n)

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A pair of fuzzy-headed trolls embark on a daring rescue mission when members of their tribe are kidnapped. Animation, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)

programme.title: Mune: Guardian Of The Moon
programme.desc: Young forest faun Mune embarks on an epic quest to reclaim the sun from the villainous ruler of the underworld. Fantasy animation, featuring the voices of Omar Sy, Izia Higelin and Michael Gregorio.(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown.(n)

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A pair of fuzzy-headed trolls embark on a daring rescue mission when members of their tribe are kidnapped. Animation, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Scientist Dr Ian Malcolm reluctantly joins a research team on the island where his employer first designed genetically engineered dinosaurs. Meanwhile, a big-game hunter takes the chance to bag the biggest prize of all - a Tyrannosaurus rex. Steven Spielberg's dinosaur adventure sequel, starring Jeff Goldblum, Julianne Moore, Pete Postlethwaite and Richard Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: The Land Before Time
programme.desc: A young brontosaurus is left alone when his mother dies, so goes off in search of a legendary valley, where food is plentiful and he will be safe. He acquires a group of new friends on his journey, who help each other to avoid predators and obstacles in their way. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gabriel Damon and Pat Hingle.(n)

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Derek's anniversary celebrations are thwarted by an evil sorcerer searching for a magical orb hidden deep inside their castle. When Derek is lured out of the palace to rescue his kidnapped mother, Odette calls on her band of animal friends for help. Animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Douglas Sills, Jake Williamson and Christy Landers.(n)

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctor's deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avenger's trap. Ridley Scott's thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: A male escort is falsely accused of murdering a wealthy woman, and his only hope of proving his innocence rests with a client reluctant to come forward and provide him with an alibi. Thriller, written and directed by Paul Schrader, starring Richard Gere, Lauren Hutton and Hector Elizondo.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a white supremacist movement to prevent their planned terrorist attack. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Toni Collette.

programme.title: Kidulthood
programme.desc: West London teenagers face difficult choices that could affect the rest of their lives, as they struggle to deal with the effects of gun crime, drugs and bullying in their impoverished neighbourhood. Drama, written by and starring Noel Clarke, with Aml Ameen, Red Madrell, Jaime Winstone and Rafe Spall.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin
programme.desc: An inner-city drug dealer puts his life of crime behind him after a near-fatal shooting to pursue a new career as a rap artist. Unfortunately, when he performs songs inspired by his shady past, his former criminal associates do not take kindly to having their misdeeds immortalised in music. Drama, starring Curtis `50 Cent' Jackson, Terrence Howard and Ashley Walters.

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Ruthless stockbroker Gordon Gekko is released from prison after eight years, reinventing himself as an author and lecturer warning against the dangers of the financial system. Gekko helps a young banker get revenge on the company that drove his mentor to suicide, but as always, has a crooked agenda of his own. Oliver Stone's sequel to his 1980s drama, with Michael Douglas, Shia LaBeouf and Carey Mulligan.

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside.

programme.title: Kidulthood
programme.desc: West London teenagers face difficult choices that could affect the rest of their lives, as they struggle to deal with the effects of gun crime, drugs and bullying in their impoverished neighbourhood. Drama, written by and starring Noel Clarke, with Aml Ameen, Red Madrell, Jaime Winstone and Rafe Spall.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin
programme.desc: An inner-city drug dealer puts his life of crime behind him after a near-fatal shooting to pursue a new career as a rap artist. Unfortunately, when he performs songs inspired by his shady past, his former criminal associates do not take kindly to having their misdeeds immortalised in music. Drama, starring Curtis `50 Cent' Jackson, Terrence Howard and Ashley Walters.

programme.title: Rising Sun
programme.desc: A cop investigating the murder of a prostitute in the Los Angeles offices of a Japanese corporation joins forces with a mysterious detective who is an expert on Asian culture. They discover security footage of the killer has been digitally altered, pointing to a secret conspiracy within the company. Thriller, adapted from the novel by Michael Crichton, starring Sean Connery, Wesley Snipes, Harvey Keitel and Tia Carrere.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: When accountant Jonathan Mardukas skips bail after having been arrested for embezzlement, bounty hunter Jack Walsh is hired to catch the fraudster and return him from New York to Los Angeles. Unfortunately, his task is hindered by the ingenuity of Mardukas and the attentions of pursuing FBI agents and Mafia hitmen. Comedy thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, Dennis Farina, John Ashton and Joe Pantoliano.

programme.title: Klute
programme.desc: A private detective investigates the disappearance of a scientist in New York, but finds his only lead is a prostitute with a tenuous connection to the missing man - and his attempts to gain her help are soon hampered by shadowy figures intent on silencing her. Alan J Pakula's thriller, starring Donald Sutherland, Roy Scheider and an Oscar-winning Jane Fonda.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A washed-up former hostage negotiator returns to regular police work, but later finds himself forced to draw on his old skills in a bid to save a crooked accountant's children, who have been taken prisoner in their own home by a gang of psychotic delinquents. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Ben Foster and Jonathan Tucker.

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: Final Analysis
programme.desc: A psychiatrist treats a woman who is repressing traumatic memories. He meets his patient's sister in the hope of learning more about their troubled childhood, but they end up having an affair. The shrink later learns his lover is married to a psychopathic gangster, and is drawn into a murderous plot. Thriller, starring Kim Basinger, Richard Gere, Uma Thurman and Eric Roberts.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.

programme.title: Roxxy
programme.desc: Romance blooms between a small-town loner and a rebellious punk rocker, but can the pair escape their troubled pasts? Drama, starring Emile Hirsch, Zoe Kravitz and Zoey Deutch.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: A daring Canadian intelligence officer falls for a beautiful French resistance fighter during the Second World War. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of conflict. Epic Robert Zemeckis thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Marion Cotillard and Jared Harris.

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: An incorruptible Chicago cop launches a relentless campaign to stop a ruthless gangster plotting to take control of the city. But the detective finds himself distracted by the attentions of a seductive nightclub singer and a faceless vigilante playing both sides against the middle. Comic-strip adventure, directed by and starring Warren Beatty, with Madonna, Al Pacino and Dustin Hoffman.

programme.title: Escobar: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: A Canadian surfer on holiday in Colombia falls in love with a local girl, only to discover to his horror that her uncle is the notorious drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. He finds himself forced to become part of Escobar's family business, putting his life on the line as he faces the dangerous reality of the international cocaine trade. Thriller, starring Benicio Del Toro and Josh Hutcherson.

programme.title: United 93
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, recreating the events on the fourth plane hijacked in the September 11 attacks in 2001. The passengers were by now aware of the destruction at the World Trade Centre and the Pentagon. Realising their plane was about to be used for a similar purpose, they set out to wrest control from the terrorists. Directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Christian Clemenson, Trish Gates, David Alan Basche and Cheyenne Jackson.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: A CIA agent stationed in South Africa is sent to question a rogue operative, who has been arrested years after betraying the agency, only to be attacked by mercenaries hired to capture the fugitive. As they flee for their lives, the interrogator has to contend with not only the enemies hunting them, but also the mind games of his prisoner. Thriller, with Denzel Washington and Ryan Reynolds.

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: Biopic of the infamous twin brothers who built up a criminal empire in the East End of London during the 1960s. Seizing territory from an already established rival by force, they quickly rose to prominence in the city's gangland culture. However, over time the brothers began to clash, while enemies stood ready to bring them down. Starring Gary and Martin Kemp, Billie Whitelaw and Tom Bell.

programme.title: Turbulence
programme.desc: A convicted killer breaks free while being flown to his place of execution on Christmas eve, and embarks on a murderous rampage, leaving a plucky stewardess with the harrowing task of outwitting him. Thriller, starring Ray Liotta, Lauren Holly, Brendan Gleeson, Ben Cross and Hector Elizondo.(n)

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
programme.desc: Retired bank robber John Doherty escapes a gunman with the aid of a young car thief, and together they go in search of the loot from the former crook's last job. When they discover the stash is missing - and John's thuggish old partners are also looking for it - the pair decide to do a repeat robbery. Comedy drama, starring Clint Eastwood, Jeff Bridges, George Kennedy and Geoffrey Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.(n)

programme.title: The Sugarland Express
programme.desc: A distraught mother persuades her incarcerated husband to break out of prison and help her take their baby out of foster care. However, their plan misfires and they end up running from the law across Texas with a state trooper as a hostage. Steven Spielberg's drama, with Goldie Hawn, Ben Johnson and William Atherton.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook double-crosses his partners in crime, a betrayal that leaves their friend and mentor dead. One year later, they regroup and come up with a daring plan to exact revenge on the traitor and reclaim their ill-gotten gains. Crime thriller inspired by the 1969 movie, starring Mark Wahlberg, Charlize Theron, Edward Norton, Seth Green and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: Following a failed assassination attempt, a soldier is stranded in the desert where he must survive the elements and stay sane enough to survive. Thriller, starring Armie Hammer, Annabelle Wallis and Tom Cullen.(n)

programme.title: First Kill
programme.desc: A desperate father is blackmailed into helping a criminal gang evade a corrupt police chief. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Hayden Christensen and Ty Shelton.(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: An assassination attempt is made on the life of the US president during a terrorism summit. The story unfolds from several perspectives, including that of the secret service agents charged with protecting the head of state, a news producer covering the event and a man in the crowd who may have caught the perpetrator on camera. Thriller, starring Dennis Quaid, Matthew Fox, Forest Whitaker, Sigourney Weaver and William Hurt.(n)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A police hostage negotiator is called in when a robbery turns into a siege. The chairman of the bank involved is worried the mastermind behind the heist is set to disclose secrets he needs to stay hidden, so he enlists the help of a political fixer. However, the elaborate nature of the thief's plan looks set to keep him one step ahead of the law, and causes problems for the detective assigned to rectify the situation. Spike Lee's thriller, with Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer, Willem Dafoe and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: Friend Request
programme.desc: A teenager meets a girl online, only to find she is a demonic entity intent on killing her real friends. Horror, starring Alycia Debnam-Carey and William Moseley.

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: A cyclist and his girlfriend are hunted by mysterious strangers in rural Chile after being subjected to a strange virus. Horror, starring Bryce Draper, Natalie Burn and Ariel Levy. In Spanish and English.

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to boost their seance scam business. However, they get more than they bargained for when they invite an evil presence into their home. Supernatural horror prequel, starring Elizabeth Reaser and Annalise Basso.

programme.title: Red Sparrow: Special
programme.desc: A look at the new espionage thriller Red Sparrow, starring Jennifer Lawrence as a former ballerina recruited into the Russian secret intelligence service.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Teenager Sam Witwicky is treated to his first car by his dad, but it turns out to be an alien scout with a life of its own. Before long, the vehicle embroils Sam in a long-running intergalactic war between two factions of giant shape-changing robots, which have come to Earth to find a mystical cube that grants infinite power to its possessor. Michael Bay's sci-fi action adventure, inspired by the toy franchise, with Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Jon Voight and John Turturro.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox.

programme.title: Red Sparrow: Special
programme.desc: A look at the new espionage thriller Red Sparrow, starring Jennifer Lawrence as a former ballerina recruited into the Russian secret intelligence service.

Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox.

programme.title: Raw
programme.desc: After a trainee vet and strict vegetarian is pressured into eating meat for the first time, she develops a craving for flesh. Horror, starring Garance Marillier, Ella Rumpf and Rabah Nait Oufella. In French.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London.

programme.title: Red Sparrow: Special
programme.desc: A look at the new espionage thriller Red Sparrow, starring Jennifer Lawrence as a former ballerina recruited into the Russian secret intelligence service.

programme.title: Target Earth
programme.desc: Former alien abductees fight fellow victims of extraterrestrial attacks who have been brainwashed into taking over the planet. Sci-fi adventure, starring Christopher Meloni, Marcia Cross and Dabney Coleman.

programme.title: Cocoon
programme.desc: The elderly residents of a retirement home treat themselves to an occasional dip in the pool at an abandoned house. It turns out that friendly aliens in human form are using the place to restore dormant members of their species - and energy from their cocoons is giving the old-timers a new lease of life. Ron Howard's sci-fi drama, with Wilford Brimley, Jessica Tandy, Hume Cronyn, Don Ameche and Steve Guttenberg.

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: After being sentenced to death, murder suspect Callum Lynch enters a virtual world in the search for a device that contains genetic code for free will. Video game adaptation, starring Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons and Brendan Gleeson.

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the near future, Wolverine cares for an ailing Professor X somewhere on the Mexican border. However, the razor-clawed hero's attempts to hide from the world are turned upside down when a young mutant arrives, pursued by lethal forces. Fantasy adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen and Stephen Merchant.

programme.title: Black Panther: Special
programme.desc: A special preview of forthcoming superhero adventure Black Panther, which sees the titular king of the fictional state of Wakanda take centre stage in Marvel's cinematic universe.

programme.title: Rings
programme.desc: A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in seven days. Horror, starring Matilda Anna Ingrid Lutz, Alex Roe and Johnny Galecki.

Fantasy adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen and Stephen Merchant.

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness
programme.desc: An executive is sent to retrieve his company's chief executive officer from a mysterious `wellness centre' in the Swiss Alps, but suspects the spa's treatments are not what they seem. Psychological thriller, starring Dane DeHaan, Mia Goth and Jason Isaacs.

programme.title: Rings
programme.desc: A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in seven days. Horror, starring Matilda Anna Ingrid Lutz, Alex Roe and Johnny Galecki.(n)

Ron Howard's sci-fi drama, with Wilford Brimley, Jessica Tandy, Hume Cronyn, Don Ameche and Steve Guttenberg.(n)

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: A teenager with special powers is forced to live as a fugitive, constantly moving from place to place with his protector to avoid aliens who seek to destroy him. His nomadic existence is threatened when he falls in love, just as he begins to realise the origin of his extraordinary abilities. Sci-fi thriller, starring Alex Pettyfer, Timothy Olyphant and Teresa Palmer.(n)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: The armoured avenger hunts for the mastermind behind an untraceable series of bombings, despite being cut off from his usual resources and traumatised by a recent brush with death. His search uncovers a secret conspiracy involving a drug that renders the user indestructible. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Gwyneth Paltrow and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare.(n)

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn.(n)

programme.title: The Girl with All the Gifts
programme.desc: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a young girl named Melanie. Horror thriller, starring Gemma Arterton, Paddy Considine, Glenn Close and Sennia Nanua.(n)

programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: Following a failed assassination attempt, a soldier is stranded in the desert where he must survive the elements and stay sane enough to survive. Thriller, starring Armie Hammer, Annabelle Wallis and Tom Cullen.

programme.title: Southern Fury
programme.desc: When his brother falls foul of a ruthless mobster, a straight-laced man calls on his old friend and cop to help out. Crime thriller, starring Adrian Grenier, John Cusack and Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: Blinky Bill: The Movie
programme.desc: A koala embarks on an epic adventure to find his missing father, teaming up with some pals and venturing into the dangerous Outback. Animated adventure, with the voices of Billy Birmingham, Toni Collette and Charlotte Rose Hamlyn.

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: A ragtag group of career criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. True-life crime drama, with Stephen Moyer, Larry Lamb and Matthew Goode.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism, the crew faces the biggest trials of their lives. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson.

programme.title: Get Him to the Greek
programme.desc: A record company employee is given the dubious task of making sure a manic, sex-crazed British rock star gets from London to his comeback concert in Los Angeles without causing too much mayhem along the way. His task is made all the more difficult by his charge's infatuation with a model. Comedy, with Russell Brand reprising his role from Forgetting Sarah Marshall alongside Jonah Hill and Rose Byrne.

programme.title: Nina
programme.desc: Troubled soul icon Nina Simone rediscovers the meaning of her life and work thanks to the support of loyal friend and assistant Clifton Henderson. Music biopic, starring Zoe Saldana, David Oyelowo and Mike Epps.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon
programme.desc: An aspiring martial artist trains under a young Bruce Lee in 1960s San Francisco, and is drawn into a showdown between his mentor and renowned Shaolin master Wong Jack Man. Martial arts biopic, starring Philip Ng, Billy Magnussen and Yu Xia.

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell.

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: While en route to Mexico, a mysterious drifter and his dog run afoul of the thugs running a dead-end mining town. Western, starring Ethan Hawke, John Travolta and Karen Gillan.

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy.

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg.

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: A young boy shipped off to his grandad's remote cattle station finds friendship and adventure with a one-of-a-kind dog. Family drama, starring Levi Miller and Jason Isaacs.

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the other's identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bay's action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A disillusioned man learns his father was a member of a secret society of superpowered assassins dedicated to eliminating people who are destined to commit acts of evil in the future. Having inherited his father's special abilities, he is recruited into the organisation and must take on a former member who has betrayed it. Action adventure, starring James McAvoy, Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman.(n)

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
programme.desc: The owner of an ailing golf club aims to raise money by drafting in a former golfing great and holding a high-stakes game. Unfortunately, the player soon realises his form is not what it was - but a mysterious caddy is on hand to dispense words of wisdom and common sense. Robert Redford's drama, starring Matt Damon, Will Smith and Charlize Theron.(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: When a series of supernatural disturbances occur in New York city, a quartet of experts in the parnormal and their dim assistant investigate. Reboot of the 1980s comedy franchise, starring Kristen Wiig, Melissa McCarthy, Kate McKinnon, Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: An American youngster goes to live in China with his mother, where he becomes an outsider and falls foul of the local bullies. He receives help from the kindly school caretaker, who turns out to be a kung fu master and offers to train the boy to defend himself. Martial arts drama, with Jaden Smith and Jackie Chan.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In the sequel to Batman Begins, the masked hero finds a new ally in his war on organised crime in Gotham's crusading new district attorney, Harvey Dent. However, both men are pushed to their limits by the rise of the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos and destruction throughout the city for his own amusement. Comic-book thriller, starring Christian Bale, Aaron Eckhart and an Oscar-winning Heath Ledger.(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: An American youngster goes to live in China with his mother, where he becomes an outsider and falls foul of the local bullies. He receives help from the kindly school caretaker, who turns out to be a kung fu master and offers to train the boy to defend himself. Martial arts drama, with Jaden Smith and Jackie Chan.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare.(n)

programme.title: God Help the Girl
programme.desc: Premiere. A woman struggling with depression breaks out of the hospital to pursue her goal of starting a band. She befriends two other misfits with musical aspirations, and together they set about making their dreams a reality. Musical drama, starring Emily Browning, Olly Alexander and Hannah Murray, directed and featuring songs by Belle & Sebastian singer Stuart Murdoch.

programme.title: Dakota
programme.desc: A professional gambler and a railway tycoon's daughter elope, hoping to make their fortune by buying land in Dakota. However, they instead find themselves helping the local farmers defend their homes against unscrupulous businessmen trying to drive them off their land. Western, starring John Wayne and Vera Hruba Ralston.

programme.title: Run for Cover
programme.desc: An honest gunfighter is released from prison after serving time for a crime he did not commit and soon befriends a young upstart. When the older man is appointed sheriff of a nearby town, he insists that his protege is made deputy - but soon discovers his loyalty is misplaced. Western, directed by Nicholas Ray and starring James Cagney, John Derek, Viveca Lindfors and Jean Hersholt.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men
programme.desc: Twelve jurors convene to decide the verdict in a murder trial. While 11 of the group are thoroughly convinced the teenage defendant is guilty, one lone voice of reason refuses to cave in to pressure and passionately argues the case for his innocence. Sidney Lumet's legal drama, starring Henry Fonda, Lee J Cobb, Ed Begley, Martin Balsam and Jack Klugman.

programme.title: The War Wagon
programme.desc: A convict is released from prison and swears vengeance on the corrupt mining contractor who took his gold-rich land. On the way, he encounters an old enemy who reveals that the gold from the mine is about to be transported in an armoured stagecoach - and suggests they join forces to steal it. Western, starring John Wayne, Kirk Douglas, Bruce Cabot and Howard Keel.

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: A father-of-two struggling to cope with the death of his wife is in need of a fresh start, so buys a house with a dilapidated zoo on the grounds. With the help of the keepers, he works to restore the attraction to its former glory, while also trying to reconnect with his troubled teenage son. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson and Thomas Haden Church.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: A corporation that creates military robots seizes a chance to diversify into law enforcement when a Detroit cop is critically injured in a bombing. He is rebuilt as a crime-fighting cyborg, but struggles to regain his free will from his creators' control. Sci-fi thriller remake, starring Joel Kinnaman, Gary Oldman, Michael Keaton and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: The infamous scientist's monster roams the Earth 200 years after burying his creator, and is drawn into an ancient supernatural conflict. Two factions of magical beings are at war, and the key to ending the conflict lies in tapping the secret of the creature's immortality. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Eckhart, Bill Nighy and Miranda Otto.

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: A scientist invents a teleportation machine, but as he prepares to test the apparatus on himself he is unaware that a housefly is inside the system with him. The experiment causes his body to splice genetically with the insect, leading to a terrifying and grotesque transformation. David Cronenberg's remake of the 1950s horror, starring Jeff Goldblum, Geena Davis and John Getz.(n)

programme.title: The Tin Star
programme.desc: A world-weary bounty hunter, formerly a sheriff, arrives in a small town where a newly-appointed lawman is struggling to keep the peace. When he learns of the mercenary's past, the inexperienced lawman seeks his help in learning the tricks of the trade so he can bring an outlaw gang to justice. Anthony Mann's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Anthony Perkins, Lee Van Cleef, Betsy Palmer and Michel Ray.(n)

programme.title: The Quick Gun
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw who left his hometown in disgrace returns to claim his late father's ranch. On the way, he runs into his former cronies, who are planning to raid the settlement while most of the men are away on a cattle drive. The prodigal son decides to make amends for his past crimes by defending the settlement. Western, starring Audie Murphy and Merry Anders.(n)

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A ruthless cattle baron sets out to create his own private empire, no matter what the cost. When he resorts to murder, he makes an enemy of a civil war veteran, while his lust for power drives his wife into the arms of his younger brother. Western, starring Edward G Robinson, Barbara Stanwyck and Glenn Ford.(n)

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: A Second World War submarine captain tries to restore his crippled vessel to its former glory, but is thwarted by his first officer, who has invited a party of nurses, children and an expectant mother on board. Mayhem ensues as the skipper struggles to rein in the female influence on ship protocol. Comedy, starring Cary Grant, Tony Curtis and Joan O'Brien.(n)

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Children's adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci.(n)

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: A professional hitman lets his emotional detachment slip when his mentor is murdered, and puts his deadly skills to the task of getting revenge. The solitary assassin finds an ally in his teacher's son, who also yearns for vengeance and persuades the killer to teach him the tricks of the trade. Action thriller remake, starring Jason Statham, Ben Foster and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert.(n)

programme.title: Future Shock! The Story of 2000AD
programme.desc: Documentary about the influential British sci-fi comic, which was launched in 1976 and introduced characters including Judge Dredd, Strontium Dog, Halo Jones and Slaine. Featuring contributions by first editor Pat Mills, artists and writers Carlos Ezquerra, Neil Gaiman, Dave Gibbons, Kevin O'Neill and Alan Grant, and readers such as Scott Ian of Anthrax and Portishead's Geoff Barrow.(n)

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: A domesticated rare bird is taken to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female, but the pair are stolen by animal smugglers. He ends up lost on the streets of a strange city, and to make it back to his owner, he will have to learn to fly for the first time in his life. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg and Anne Hathaway.(n)

programme.title: Avatar Special
programme.desc: Sigourney Weaver and other cast members discuss the making of James Cameron's sci-fi epic.(n)

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: A Miami street dancer faces a series of setbacks as he seeks his fortune in Hollywood. He assembles a team of dancers which prove successful in a reality TV contest broadcast from Las Vegas, but struggles to put aside old conflicts in the pursuit of his dreams. Fifth film in the dance drama series, starring Ryan Guzman and Briana Evigan.(n)

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Dr Bruce Banner turns into the rampaging green Hulk after exposure to a huge dose of gamma radiation, prompting the military to embark on a no-holds-barred mission to destroy the monster. Meanwhile, Banner's unstable father resurfaces, holding the secret to his transformation. Comic-book adventure from director Ang Lee, starring Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott and Nick Nolte.(n)

programme.title: Avatar
programme.desc: A paraplegic soldier uses technology that allows him to control a genetically engineered body on a mission to a dangerous jungle world. His assignment is to infiltrate an alien tribe on behalf of a corrupt mining corporation, which wants to drive them from their land. He comes to sympathise with the natives, and helps them fight back against his employers. James Cameron's sci-fi adventure, starring Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver and Stephen Lang.(n)

programme.title: R.I.P.D
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges.(n)

programme.title: The Pyramid
programme.desc: A previously unexplored pyramid is discovered in the Egyptian desert, and a party of archaeologists sets out to uncover its secrets. The explorers soon find the tomb is riddled with deadly traps, but this proves the least of their worries when they realise it was built to contain dark forces that they have now unleashed. Horror, starring Ashley Hinshaw and Denis O'Hare.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A widow enlists John-Boy's help in her efforts to win the affections of a farm worker who is hoping to settle down.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy catches his friend Yancy Tucker stealing two chickens and agonises over whether to report him. With Richard Thomas and Robert Donner.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A forthcoming county fair brings out a streak of competitiveness in the family. Olivia is surprised to hear her childhood sweetheart, the now wealthy Oscar Cockrell, is to be one of the judges. Peter Donat guest stars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls family rallies round and tries to lift Grandfather Holbrook's spirits after the death of his wife by suggesting he write a book. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Barry Sullivan.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Telephones are installed in Walnut Grove, giving Mrs Oleson the opportunity to do a spot of eavesdropping - but unfortunately she overhears a secret which could destroy Jonathan and Alice Garvey's marriage.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: The newlyweds attempt a honeymoon getaway and Jim goes back into rehab.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney is alarmed as visions of her mother stop, while Jim makes good progress at the rehab centre and helps a frustrated friend.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a Vietnamese couple searching for their children whom they were forced to give up during the war.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark visit a friend running a camp for blind children, and help a model who has been disfigured in an accident to make a fresh start.

programme.title: Carolina Moon
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town, where she discovers that the killer of her childhood friend is still terrorising the community, and embarks on a mission to track him down before he claims another life. However, while trying to capture the murderer, romance unexpectedly blossoms between her and the handsome older brother of her deceased friend. Romantic mystery, starring Claire Forlani and Oliver Hudson.

programme.title: A Woman's Guide to Adultery
programme.desc: Part one of two. Drama about four women and their differing views on relationships and adultery. Based on the best-selling novel by Carol Clewlow, and starring Theresa Russell, Amanda Donohoe and Sean Bean.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy challenges a rich young man in the traditional cross-country race that was won many years earlier by Grandpa Walton.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd's love life improves after she meets a single father, but their relationship is shaken when she finds out he has a heart condition that causes him to have blackouts.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Heartbeat
programme.desc: A pregnant TV producer, abandoned by her husband, falls for an equally lonely divorced colleague, but their romance is threatened by her inability to let go of the past. Drama, starring John Ritter, Polly Draper, Nancy Morgan and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Palomino
programme.desc: A photographer, struggling to overcome the break-up of her marriage by going to live on a friend's California ranch, where her riding skills impress the ranch hands - one of whom she embarks on a passionate affair with. However, her life takes a turn for the worse when her new lover is unable to cope with the class difference between them and an accident leaves her paralysed. Drama, starring Lee Horsley, Lindsay Frost, Eva Marie Saint and Rod Taylor.

programme.title: Roots
programme.desc: George rejoins his family and Tom puts his life on the line by agreeing to identify the raiders attacking freed slaves.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A forthcoming county fair brings out a streak of competitiveness in the family. Olivia is surprised to hear her childhood sweetheart, the now wealthy Oscar Cockrell, is to be one of the judges. Peter Donat guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Orphan Hobart Shank comes to stay and John-Boy tries to get him a contract as a professional baseball player - but tragedy strikes when he breaks his arm in a fall, destroying his one chance at fame.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin finds an orphaned fawn and decides to nurse it back to health, while John-Boy's new job as a rent collector makes him extremely unpopular with the locals. Charles Tyner guest stars, with Richard Thomas.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Davenports' grandson comes to stay and turns out to be an angry, hate-filled bully bent on causing trouble.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert and Laura try to scare a bully into behaving by convincing him there's a werewolf on the loose. Their plan fails miserably, but prompts the rest of the schoolchildren to make a stand against the playground tyrant.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim accepts a lift with an assortment of dubious characters and doesn't return home on time, leaving Syd fretting over what's become of him.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Robbie sells his skis to buy a new sewing machine for Tina, and Joanie becomes a contestant on the American version of TV show Blind Date, while Syd follows her therapist's advice and participates in an evening of `speed dating'.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A young man learns that the brother he once considered institutionalising has a brilliant mind within a paralysed body. Michael Landon stars.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark mistakenly thinks Jonathan has been turned into a dog, and helps to reunite a young runaway with his family.(n)

programme.title: Nora Roberts' Tribute
programme.desc: A former child star begins a relationship with her new neighbour while restoring her grandmother's old house. She is haunted by disturbing dreams that compel her to unravel the truth behind her grandmother's death, supposedly from a drug overdose, 30 years previously. Romantic mystery, with Brittany Murphy, Jason Lewis, Christian Oliver, Diana Scarwid and Tippi Hedren.(n)

programme.title: A Woman's Guide to Adultery
programme.desc: Part two of two. Drama about four women and their differing views on relationships and adultery. Based on the best-selling novel by Carol Clewlow, and starring Theresa Russell, Amanda Donohoe and Sean Bean.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob gets frustrated when nobody pays attention to his personal feelings, and runs away from home.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd meets an old medical school friend on leave from a rural African hospital, but he soon shows symptoms of the deadly Ebola virus, forcing the health department to clamp a quarantine around Syd's clinic and the Hansen household where a children's party is in full swing. Melina Kanakaredes stars.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Zoya
programme.desc: Part one of two. A Russian aristocrat is forced by the Revolution into a life of poverty-stricken exile in Paris, where she falls for a handsome American soldier. The couple move to New York and seem set for a life of happiness - until the Wall Street Crash deals another devastating blow. Melodrama, based on Danielle Steel's novel, starring Melissa Gilbert, Bruce Boxleitner and Diana Rigg.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Zoya
programme.desc: The Wall Street Crash deals another devastating blow to exiled Russian aristocrat Zoya as she moves to New York with the handsome American soldier she met in Paris. Concluding part of the melodrama based on Danielle Steel's novel, starring Melissa Gilbert, Bruce Boxleitner and Diana Rigg.(n)

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drama following the history of a black American family. In the aftermath of the Civil War, Tom Harvey joins a group of black politicians and an inter-racial marriage causes outrage.(n)

programme.title: Restless Virgins
programme.desc: A biographical drama based upon the ex scandal that shook Massachusetts prep school, Milton Academy in 2004-05 school year. Drama, starring Vanessa Marano, Max Lloyd-Jones and Charlie Carver.(n)

programme.title: Blue Caprice
programme.desc: An abandoned teenager is taken in by an embittered man, who teaches him that modern society is completely corrupt. He takes the impressionable youth to Washington, DC, and together they spend the following week killing strangers at random. Fact-based crime drama, starring Isaiah Washington, Tequan Richmond, Joey Lauren Adams and Tim Blake Nelson.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The anticipated joy of Thanksgiving turns to sorrow for the family when John-Boy suffers a head injury.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. John-Boy is rushed into hospital to have a blood clot removed from his brain.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Whatever Happened to the Class of '56?
programme.desc: The Ingalls attend a farmers' convention where they bump into several old friends. While Charles tries to persuade the smaller landowners to stand up to their considerably bigger rivals, Caroline is surprised to discover how few of her former acquaintances are happy with their lives. Michael Landon and Karen Grassle star.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: During a stormy night, Laura and Mary are taken hostage by escaped convicts and held in the school. When one of their number falls ill, they demand Laura fetch a doctor - but she returns with her father.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd faces a malpractice suit from a high-risk pregnancy patient and begins to doubt her decision to end her therapy sessions. Joanie and Phil go on a purely platonic date - but soon find their feelings getting in the way of their friendship. Ashley Johnson and Isabella Hoffman guest star.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd feels oppressed in the aftermath of the malpractice suit and Jim returns to full-time work under Sam's watchful eye. Tina seeks professional advice about childbirth, and learns she may have to undergo surgery to conceive.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A forestry student visits the family, and Mary Ellen and Erin both fall for him.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A new pupil at the school has troubled reading, but Elizabeth realises why and finds a way to help him.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: When young widow Olivia comes to stay in their home, the Walton children learn a hard lesson about how to cope with another person's grief.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A movie is being filmed in town. John-Boy offers to changed the dialogue to make it more authentic - which results in the writer, who is an old friend, getting fired.(n)

Romantic mystery, starring Claire Forlani and Oliver Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: First of a two-part drama about the legendary son of Zeus. The Princess of Thebes falls pregnant by the chief of the gods. Once born, the child is made to feel an outcast as he is rejected by his mother, envied by brother Iphicles and the target of a revenge plot by Zeus's wife Hera. Forced into exile, Hercules agrees to a series of tasks to redeem himself. With Paul Telfer, Elizabeth Perkins, Timothy Dalton and Luke Ford.(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama based on Greek mythology. The adventurer heads for the flaming waves of the River Styx and into the depths of Hell, finding himself facing terrifying odds as he tries to regain his stature. Paul Telfer and Elizabeth Perkins star.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adaptation of the fairy tale set in post-war Rome, following the story of a young woman with a gift for music who is forced to work as a maid in her stepmother's hotel. With Rosabell Laurenti Sellers and Frank Crudele.(n)
